Actions.Name: Compose a linked template
Actions.Description: This operation composes a template that is linked to a SharePoint list.

Actions.Name: Compose all the linked templates
Actions.Description: This operation composes all templates that are linked to a SharePoint list.

Actions.Name: Get api version
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves the current DocFusion365 API version.

Actions.Name: Get the linked list templates
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves the linked DocFusion365 templates of a SharePoint list.
